column1: The Master-stone was the chief of all the palantíri
column3: which was held in the Tower of Avallónë on the Tol Eressëa. It was said that the Seeing-stone in Elostirion in the Tower Hills could be used to look back along the Straight Road and glimpse the Tower.

column1: The Stone of Avallónë is variously named the "Masterstone" or Master-stone. There was also a Master Stone of Middle-earth
column3: but this was a lesser Stone than the Masterstone in Avallónë
column4: having power only over other palantíri in Middle-earth.
